title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu calls for strengthening the local bodies financially

description: This year the competition will focus on the evolving field of criminal law, with special emphasis on NDPS (Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances) cases.

CLSA has an outperform rating on Indus Tower, despite concerns about its Africa expansion and dividend payouts. Citigroup suggests a buy for M&M Finance, noting improvements in risk management.

title: 'Gukesh will lose his title': Uzbek GM's latest comment sparks controversy - Watch
description: Nodirbek Abdusattorov ignited a pre-tournament buzz by confidently predicting D Gukesh's title loss, adding intrigue to the FIDE Grand Swiss 2025. While Gukesh aims to test himself in the Swiss format despite already securing his title match spot, Abdusattorov's remark intensifies the competition, especially with Candidates Tournament qualification at stake for many participants.

description: The Japanese 23rd seed stretched her unbeaten run in major quarter-finals to 5-0 and booked a clash with Amanda Anisimova

Despite potential legal repercussions, Modi prioritized widespread access to ensure the tournament's success. This decision later led to contract disputes, investigations, and legal proceedings against Modi regarding alleged favoritism towards World Sports Group.

Companies anticipate increased demand for various products, with tax cut benefits passed on through price reductions or increased grammage. This move is expected to energize consumer sentiment, particularly in rural areas, and stimulate growth in the FMCG sector.

Dr. Ladapo, a known vaccine skeptic, has clashed with public health authorities in the past. The state plans to form a commission tied to Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to further this agenda.

Insider trading: Sebi asks banks to tighten controls; UPSI under watch
description: Sebi chief Tuhin Kanta Pandey urged listed banks to strengthen internal controls to prevent insider trading, emphasizing their dual responsibility in safeguarding unpublished price-sensitive information (UPSI) related to both the bank and its client companies. He highlighted that weak controls lead to stock market frauds and stressed the moral responsibility of banks' management in complying with insider trading regulations.

title: ‘Coolie’ BO collection day 21: Rajinikanth’s action film slows down; earns Rs 1 crore
description: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie,' directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, is experiencing a slowdown in its third week after a massive opening. Despite a weekday dip, the film continues to draw audiences, showcasing Rajinikanth's star power. The movie has grossed over Rs 500 crore worldwide, even amid mixed audience reactions, with the director addressing speculation about time travel and cinematic universes.

description: Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor's 'Param Sundari' has grossed over Rs 50 crore worldwide in its first six days, marking a significant milestone for both actors. The romantic comedy, directed by Tushar Jalota, saw a midweek slowdown after a strong opening, but faces competition from 'Baaghi 4' which is releasing soon.

title: Relief for minority migrants from Afghanistan, Bangladesh & Pakistan
description: India's Immigration and Foreigners Act 2025, effective Monday, exempts persecuted minorities from Afghanistan, Bangladesh, and Pakistan—Hindus, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, and Parsis—who arrived before December 31, 2024, from penalties for lacking valid documents. This exemption doesn't affect the Citizenship Amendment Act's citizenship criteria.

How Majorana particles promise to shield quantum computers from noise
description: In our everyday world, swapping two identical oranges changes nothing at all. In the quantum world, bosons don’t change their overall wavefunction when swapped whereas fermions change only by a minus sign. If you exchange two non-Abelian anyons, however, the joint quantum state changes in a deeper way with significant implications for quantum computing

description: Wayne Gretzky, once the undisputed symbol of Canadian hockey, is now being re-evaluated as the sport evolves. While his legacy remains significant, the rise of international stars and Canada's changing role in the global game have sparked an identity crisis. Canadians are urged to embrace a future where their hockey identity extends beyond a single figure.

title: Trump unlawfully cancelled Harvard's research grants, U.S. judge rules
description: The judge said Mr. Trump was right to combat antisemitism and that Harvard was “wrong to tolerate hateful behaviour as long as it did” but fighting antisemitism was not the administration’s true aim and that officials wanted to pressure Harvard to accede to its demands in violation of its free-speech rights under the U.S. Constitution’s First Amendment

description: Meso will be taking part in her first senior World Cup after competing in two U19 Women’s T20 World Cups in 2023 and 2025

title: After 11-year trial, 4 acquitted in fabricated 'gang-rape' case
description: In Etah, Uttar Pradesh, four men were acquitted after an 11-year gang-rape trial when the woman admitted the crime never occurred. The court ordered action against the woman and her husband for filing a false case, and against the investigating officer for a flawed investigation.

description: Arun Gawli, the notorious Mumbai don, was released from Nagpur Central Prison after the Supreme Court granted him bail in a 2007 murder case. title: With GST rate cuts, govt expects lower prices to reach consumers
description: The government anticipates businesses will pass on the benefits of lower GST rates to consumers. The CBIC will engage with industry to ensure compliance, with indications suggesting a positive response. While the anti-profiteering agency is disbanded, the provision remains, and guidance will be issued for goods already in stock, allowing businesses to claim credit for the reduced tax.

title: Nissanka surpasses Dilshan to become SL's third-highest run-getter in T20Is
description: In 66 T20Is for Sri Lanka, Nissanka has scored 1,909 runs at an average of 30.79, with a strike rate of 122.68. He has 15 half-centuries in the format with the best score of 90.

title: Sitharaman’s ‘Diwali gift’: From paneer to paratha, Centre explains tweaks in GST rates; FAQs
description: The GST Council has approved significant rate cuts across various sectors, effective September 22nd, providing relief to consumers and farmers. Daily-use items like hair oil, shampoo, and toothpaste will now attract a reduced 5% GST, while health and life insurance are entirely exempt.

description: The GST Council has approved a major overhaul of the indirect tax system, introducing a simplified two-rate structure of 5% and 18%, along with a 40% slab for select goods. Effective September 22nd, these changes aim to reduce tax burdens on common goods, eliminate classification disputes, and boost consumption.

A juvenile involved in the crime was tried separately and also sentenced to life imprisonment,” said Santosh Mishra, Additional Public Prosecutor

title: Holiday for Telangana govt. offices, educational institutions on Sept. 6

description: West Bengal has cautioned that granting governors the power to decide the fate of bills would undermine states' legislative functions. The Supreme Court's timeline for governors and the President would expedite the process of turning people's will into laws. The Constitution does not assign governors a dominating position in state legislative or executive functions, according to the TMC government.

description: Gabrielle Union bravely shared her challenging journey through perimenopause, beginning in her late 30s, and the emotional toll it took. Ultimately, they found joy in welcoming their daughter, Kaavia, via surrogacy, and are now relishing parenthood.

Kawhi Leonard name dragged into no-show endorsement scam
description: Kawhi Leonard, who joined the Clippers in 2019, is now linked to a fraudulent tree-planting company, Aspiration, allegedly funded by Steve Ballmer. Leonard reportedly signed a $28 million "no-show job" endorsement deal with Aspiration through KL2 Aspire LLC. The Clippers deny circumventing the salary cap, while Aspiration is under U.S. government investigation.

title: ‘Not hundreds of thousands’: Musk’s daughter says she’s broke; opens up on fame, father
description: Vivian Wilson, Elon Musk's daughter, asserts her financial independence despite her father's wealth, sharing that she lives with roommates to save money. The aspiring model, who recently graced Teen Vogue, navigates newfound fame while striving to be recognized beyond her family connections. Wilson, who cut ties with Musk in 2022, aims to establish her own identity.

title: Steve Jobs’ last email to self on Apple ID; Writes: I don’t make any of my own clothing
description: A personal email penned by Steve Jobs a year before his death has resurfaced, offering a rare glimpse into the Apple visionary's reflections. Sent to himself, the email reveals Jobs's profound gratitude for the countless contributions of others that shaped his life. He acknowledged his dependence on humanity, both past and present, for his well-being and existence.

title: Meet Kindred Lubeck: Jeweler behind Taylor’s engagement ring
description: Kindred Lubeck, a 30-year-old jeweler, has gained global recognition for co-designing Taylor Swift's engagement ring with Travis Kelce. Leaving her law firm job, Lubeck pursued her passion, launching Artifex Fine Jewelry in 2023. Overcoming doubts, she built her New York City studio without loans. Lubeck's journey highlights the power of resilience and passion, resonating with creatives and athletes alike.

title: ‘A bet on myself’: Youngest female billionaire on why she left college early
description: Lucy Guo, the youngest self-made billionaire, attributes her success to her frugal upbringing and early entrepreneurial spirit. Despite disappointing her immigrant parents by dropping out of Carnegie Mellon, she pursued the Thiel Fellowship and founded successful ventures like Scale AI and Passes.

title: 'Nothing is working': Matthew Stafford’s wife exhausted over parenting challenges
description: Kelly Stafford, wife of Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford, is candidly navigating the challenges of raising four daughters. She revealed struggles with one daughter's disrespectful behavior towards coaches and emotional outbursts. Despite parenting exhaustion and Matthew's demanding NFL schedule, Kelly balances family life, celebrating milestones like back-to-school while supporting her husband's preseason preparations for the upcoming 2025 season.

title: Jack Brady skips Gisele visit for special outing with mom Bridget Moynahan
description: Bridget Moynahan and her son Jack were spotted at the US Open, continuing their tradition at Arthur Ashe Stadium. This appearance followed Tom Brady's heartfelt social media tribute to Jack on his 18th birthday, highlighting their strong father-son bond. Despite Brady and Moynahan's past relationship, they maintain a respectful co-parenting dynamic, prioritizing their children's well-being.
